alert.note: Alert for Eastern Will; Ford; Grundy; Iroquois; Kankakee; Kendall; La Salle; Livingston; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Gusty showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Livingston, southern Kendall, east central La Salle, southwestern Will, Grundy, Kankakee, north central Ford and northwestern Iroquois Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 337 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of gusty showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Streator to 7 miles southeast of Dwight to near Ashkum. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Isolated wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kankakee, Bourbonnais, Bradley, Morris, Channahon, Minooka, Manteno, Braidwood, Wilmington, Coal City, Marseilles, Dwight, Momence, Gilman, Herscher, Clifton, Diamond, Seneca, Elwood and Limestone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Will; Ford; Grundy; Iroquois; Kankakee; Kendall; La Salle; Livingston; Southern Will
